page.title: 16Chatteris - A Working Day
page.content:
My Dad gets up at 7.30, has his breakfast and leaves for work at around 8.15. He works for Sheaffer Pens and travels to various places in a red Sierra car. Sometimes he goes as far as Newcastle.
He has worked for Sheaffers for ten years and sells pens to big stores like Boots and W.H.Smiths. He usually gets home about 5.30 and then changes his suit for something more comfortable, before having his tea. At about 7.00 he does his paper work which may take two hours.
He then usually watches television until about 11.45 when he goes to bed.
